channel.title: Engine Error vertex buffer
channel.description:
This Crash happend only 1 time [url]https://www.team-underground.net/public/2012-09-16_00023.jpg[/url] [url]https://www.team-underground.net/public/Black%20Mesa%20bug.JPG[/url]
Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer 42844>32768 Tell a programmer to up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE.
Edit: After a second try i have no error....
My resolution is 1280x960
